UDP.UDP_Model

Class UDP_ListenerServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • UDP.UDP_Model.UDP_ListenerServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UDP_ListenerServer
extends java.lang.Thread

    UDP Listener Server

    A UDP listener listens to all incoming connections port specified port. Receives packet and then sends back the ack.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UDP_ListenerServer

        public UDP_ListenerServer(UDPViewModel viewModel,
                          int port)

        UDP listener construct

        The udp connection requires two parameters port and view model.

        Parameters:
        port - the parameter is required to start a server on specified port.
        viewModel - to display results for user.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

        Run function to start listener

        Simply runs the runnable thread to listen everything from client

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • listen

        private void listen()

        Listen

        Function for listening connected client and communicates with it. The while loop is running until we set flag to false.

      • PrintPacket

        private void PrintPacket(UDPPacket packet)

        Print Packet

        Function for printing the results from client, prints to text area and logs

        Parameters:
        packet - the parameter is UDP packet object.

        Send Response

        Parameters:

        port - receiver port is required.

      • setFlag

        public void setFlag(boolean flag)

        Set Flag

        Function sets flag to true of false. This function is being called when listener is wanted to stop or start.

        Parameters:
        flag - the parameter declares flag to true or false
